descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4][img]https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/281730813073293313/282914011366948864/ZKewC8V.png[/img]

This is a Lite version (Due to murky permissions on content in the full version) 
The full version is on LL, you will have to find it yourselves
It is not allowed to be linked here so don't ask![/size][/b]

[size=6]Requires:
[size=3]- HDT physics
- Racemenu (Limited use in ECE or Vanilla)[/size][/size]
 

[b][size=5]installation
[size=3]use MO,NMM or [/size][/size][size=3]just drop that in data folder[/size][/b]


[size=4]How to use
[size=3]Open race menu and choose the ani-mei and change sex to female(No male yet)[/size]
[/size]
[size=3]
[size=4]Available slider lists[/size]
- All face tint colours
- Hair colours
[size=3][size=3]- Eye colour[/size][/size]
- Skin tone

[size=4]Face morphs using:[/size]
- Nose Type slider - it will change the whole face not just nose
- Eye shape slider - changes the eyelash shape/style
 

Only one hair available in lite(twin tail)
Seek full version for many more

All race menu scale sliders work(Head scale,leg scale,hight....)
[/size]
[b][s]i love fair skin texture if you like fair skin? use optional texture it based fair skin[/s]
(Custom body texture now only in full version) [/b]

This Lite version wont be updated as much, its more of a showcase for the full version
(Some images in the gallery will be from the full version)
One important note this version is completely intendant and permission free, the miku head and hair model used has a free to use policy
(most MMD models are free to use, but were being conservative about it just to be safe)

Full version has far more content, and will be frequently updated



[size=4]latest change log
[/size]
1.2L
-Fixed wrong texture path for hair
1.1L
- New face and eye morphs done by Shangus([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/17674549]callbun77[/url]). There are two new faces with different eyes and jaws, which are be selected by changing the Nose Type option. There are also different eyelash "spike" designs that can be chosen with the Eye Shape slider.
(quote from mud)

[size=4]Screenshots[/size]
ASO is used in the screenshots, a mod by Speaker and the ASO Team
